entry.msg: added java 1.3 compliant patch for java bug from Maxym Mykhalchuk: also see: http://developer.java.sun.com/developer/bugParade/bugs/4799813.html

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: modified build-process: - there are now separate targets for source-, binary- and demo-distribution - added new property: language.resources.file - version number is automatically written to LanguageResources.properties file - added version number and project contributors to about-dialog - modified design of changelog (left away filenames)

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: - fixed bug #885480 "Toggle of Toolbar in View Menu incorrect" - removed unnecessary "exclusive mode" feature (view html and source in a splitpane.) - removed the JSplitPane code that was necessary for exclusive mode - added syntax-highlighting in html-source-view - changed margin from 4px to 0px - changed background-color for html-source-pane to white

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: fixed bug with "remove link" button being displayed although there was no link yet.

entry.msg: removed KafenioTest class because it has been replaced by Kafenio class.

entry.msg: - added manifest to /etc folder so that it doesn't get overwritten by ant anymore - changed manifest location in build.xml

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: - moved properties out of the build.xml into build.properties - created new propertyfile "build.number" that holds and updates the build number each time you build. - removed timestamp from files and added <major.version>_<minor.version>_<build.number> instead. - major and minor version number are now kept in the build.properties file.

entry.msg: added new language strings for hyperlink insertion dialog.

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg:
refactored image-insertion dialog. new features: - image scaling, - display of original and current widths - keep aspect ratio / don't keep aspect ratio when resizing - changed layout - removed unnecessary "preview" button.
support for relative paths added (when document is imported or changed, the document is parsed and all image-paths are converted to absolute paths. when document is exported, all ocurrences of the codebase url are deleted.)

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: - added changes from romuald including fix for image-loading issue - modified please-wait splash screen to load in a separate thread. - fixed issue with behaviour on shift-return and return - looks like the best version so far.

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: implemented HTML-entity translator taken from the htmlparser project on sourceforge.net fixed bug #895133 addressed by Jason P Kitkat in the kafenio tracker (HTML 4.0 entities)

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: - fixed bug #885480 "Toggle of Toolbar in View Menu incorrect" - removed unnecessary "exclusive mode" feature (view html and source in a splitpane.) - removed the JSplitPane code that was necessary for exclusive mode - added syntax-highlighting in html-source-view - changed margin from 4px to 0px - changed background-color for html-source-pane to white

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: changed formatting of txtchangelog.xsl

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: - added changes from daniel polansky - added support for unicode-text-export to KafenioPanel - introduced new UNICODE-applet-parameter to enable unicode text-export - introduced new commandline-switch to enable unicode text-export in standalone kafenio. - fixed bug that all changes made in source-code-view are lost when saving while in source-code editing mode

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: - implemented loading of html-entity-to-character mapping from property file (saves more than 1 KB code!) - changed filepath for filenames that are displayed if an inserted image can't be loaded.

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: - added documentation about new applet parameter "unicode"

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: - added changes from daniel polansky - added support for unicode-text-export to KafenioPanel - introduced new UNICODE-applet-parameter to enable unicode text-export - introduced new commandline-switch to enable unicode text-export in standalone kafenio. - fixed bug that all changes made in source-code-view are lost when saving while in source-code editing mode

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: - implemented changes from daniel polansky (refactorings to allow use of KafenioPanel in any other Java application) - modified Manifest as proposed by d.p. - fixed bug in new code

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg:
- fixed java 1.3 incompatibilities - fixed a bug when deleting tables: the last row was not removed if there is no content after the table. - added keyTyped event handing for the space-key, if previous character is a &, " " is written instead of a " " character. - added keyTyped event handling for pressing the enter-key. on pressing the enter-key, a
tag is added at the current caret position (same as shift-enter in former releases) - removed "throws HeadlessException" in constructor of AbstractKafenioDialog to preserve java 1.3 compatibility

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: added Redo.gif and Undo.gif

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: - added support for shift pressed modifier in list-item key event listener - removed unnecessary validate() method

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: added project.index file to cvsignore list.

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: most current changelog (not THE current, as anonymous sourceforge cvs is not in sync currently)

entry.msg: added manifest to kafenio.jar and distribution

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: - added support for balDeduct if amount in database topup table is negative.

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: implemented new image dialog from maxym.

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg:
refactored image-insertion dialog. new features: - image scaling, - display of original and current widths - keep aspect ratio / don't keep aspect ratio when resizing - changed layout - removed unnecessary "preview" button.
support for relative paths added (when document is imported or changed, the document is parsed and all image-paths are converted to absolute paths. when document is exported, all ocurrences of the codebase url are deleted.)

entry.msg: renamed Color-fields from BLACK to black and BLUE to blue to make code java 1.3 compliant.

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: - Problems when inserting an image partly fixed - issue that text does not appear in editor when deleting text that is selected using ctrl-a and backspace fixed.

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: added new Hyperlink insertion dialog from maxym (insert link from server is currently not available.)

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: - refactored code to make KafenioPanel work with any Swing container (such as JApplet, JFrame, JWindow etc.) - fixed bug: if KafenioPanel is not running in applet-mode, the Image-Button automatically starts the insertlocalfile-dialog instead of the insertserverimage dialog. - moved methods for parsing menu- and toolbar-strings into item vectors to the KafenioPanelConfiguration class. - created new Kafenio.class to demonstrate standalone-editor functionality. - introduced new KafenioContainerInterface class. this class needs to be implemented by any application that wants to add the KafenioPanel.

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: added logging to all classes and replaced system.out.println, system.out.print, system.err.println, system.err.print, exception.printstacktrace and catch-blocks without error message with valid log.debug, log.error and log.info statements that make use of the newly introduced LeanLogger class in package de.xeinfach.kafenio.util.

entry.author: netsrak
entry.msg: - added latest changelog - changed format of hyperlinks in filechooser from <name>=<value> to <name> (<value>)

entry.msg: made the change proposed by jason in the forums to change the jarsigner command from "jarsigner dist/applet.jar -alias myApplet" to "jarsigner dist/applet.jar myApplet". the proposed command is compatible with mac-os and windows version of jarsigner.

entry.msg: fixed the following bugs: - text is not selected after adding a link, removing all formats etc. - character before image and the image itself is deleted when removing all formats - images are deleted when removing a link - images are deleted when adding a link - removing a link also clears the character formattings like font face, size etc.
